# Rettangoli
> Rettangoli is a frontend toolkit with three main parts: FE (schema-driven app layer), UI (web components and primitives), and VT (visual testing).

This file is a curated index for LLM-based tools. Prefer linked docs over guessing behavior.

## Core Docs
- https://rettangoli.dev/fe/docs/introduction/introduction/
- https://rettangoli.dev/fe/docs/introduction/getting-started/
- https://rettangoli.dev/ui/docs/introduction/introduction/
- https://rettangoli.dev/ui/docs/introduction/getting-started/
- https://rettangoli.dev/vt/docs/introduction/quickstart/

## FE (Rettangoli FE)
- https://rettangoli.dev/fe/docs/guides/schema/
- https://rettangoli.dev/fe/docs/guides/view/
- https://rettangoli.dev/fe/docs/guides/store/
- https://rettangoli.dev/fe/docs/guides/handlers/
- https://rettangoli.dev/fe/docs/guides/methods/
- https://rettangoli.dev/fe/docs/guides/constants/
- https://rettangoli.dev/fe/docs/guides/refs-and-events/
- https://rettangoli.dev/fe/docs/guides/component-architecture/
- https://rettangoli.dev/fe/docs/guides/cli/

## UI (Rettangoli UI)
- https://rettangoli.dev/ui/docs/introduction/component-model/
- https://rettangoli.dev/ui/docs/introduction/css-variables/
- https://rettangoli.dev/ui/docs/introduction/responsiveness/
- https://rettangoli.dev/ui/docs/primitives/rtgl-view/
- https://rettangoli.dev/ui/docs/primitives/rtgl-button/
- https://rettangoli.dev/ui/docs/primitives/rtgl-input/
- https://rettangoli.dev/ui/docs/primitives/rtgl-text/
- https://rettangoli.dev/ui/docs/components/rtgl-form/
- https://rettangoli.dev/ui/docs/components/rtgl-select/
- https://rettangoli.dev/ui/docs/components/rtgl-popover-input/
- https://rettangoli.dev/ui/docs/components/rtgl-dropdown-menu/
- https://rettangoli.dev/ui/docs/components/rtgl-table/

## VT (Rettangoli VT)
- https://rettangoli.dev/vt/docs/reference/cli/
- https://rettangoli.dev/vt/docs/reference/configuration/
- https://rettangoli.dev/vt/docs/reference/frontmatter/
- https://rettangoli.dev/vt/docs/reference/step-actions/
- https://rettangoli.dev/vt/docs/reference/viewport/
- https://rettangoli.dev/vt/docs/reference/selectors-and-artifacts/
- https://rettangoli.dev/vt/docs/reference/sites-integration/

## Notes
- UI docs describe current attribute names and behavior; treat those as source of truth for component usage.
- VT docs define capture/report workflow, config contract, and step action semantics.
- FE docs define schema, handlers, state flow, and architecture conventions.
